specialNotes: Allegheny County has over 40 Magisterial District Courts
Your case is heard at the district court covering your property location
Contact District Court Administration if unsure which court serves your area
Pittsburgh has some additional tenant protections beyond state law
NLSA provides excellent free legal services for income-eligible tenants
Some district courts offer evening hours - check with your local court
proceduralTips: Find your correct Magisterial District Court before filing or appearing
Arrive early to navigate parking and building security
Bring copies of all documents for judge and opposing party
Contact NLSA early in the process for legal assistance
Ask court clerk for procedural questions
